author: chfast
content:
I've modified evmone's test coverage builds (now runs in seconds) and its reporting for EEST:
https://app.codecov.io/github/ipsilon/evmone/flags/master?flags[0]=eest-develop&flags[1]=eest-legacy&flags[2]=eest-static&flags[3]=eest-fusaka

where `eest-legacy` stands for some combination of ethereum/tests and ethereum/legacytests...
